Module deliverif.app
Package deliverif.app.view

Class App

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
deliverif.app.view.App
public class App
extends javafx.application.Application
JavaFX App. Main class. Initialize and show the fxml scene of the application.

    • loadFXML

      private static javafx.scene.Parent loadFXML​(java.lang.String fxml) throws java.io.IOException
      Used to load the FXML file from the app resources by its name. Returns the Parent instance of the scene.
      Parameters:
      fxml - name of the fxml file in the resources of the app.
      Returns:
      Parent used then to create the scene
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • choseMapFile

      public static Map choseMapFile​(XmlReader reader) throws java.io.IOException
      Shows a dialogue window to choose a xml map file and returns the map created with this file.
      Parameters:
      reader - XmlReader to read the map file.
      Returns:
      model.map.Map instance of the map. Null if the reading operation failed. Empty if cancelled.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • choseRequestFile

      public static PlanningRequest choseRequestFile​(XmlReader reader) throws java.io.IOException
      Shows a dialogue window to choose a xml request file and returns the planning request created with this file.
      Parameters:
      reader - XmlReader to read the request file.
      Returns:
      model.map.PlanningRequest instance of the request. Null if the reading operation failed. Empty if cancelled.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
